short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly import the software that you use into your software library shelves over at LTD.Ninja

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LTD.Ninja is the all in one software library management system. It allows you to keep track of all your subscriptions as well as Life-Time-Deal (LTD) applications.

While the website will list all the current deals, this extension will notify you of all the deals you have not yet marked as seen. YES, you heard me right. Not just "NEW" deals or whatever that might mean. No. You're in control of everything that is shown to you and only the items that you are interested in are listed on your website and the counter for new deals is shown in the browser so that you never miss a new deal.

In addition, this tool will allow you to import your software from the largest software providers, but you can also use it one item at a time. Do you need to add Adobe subscription to your software virtual shelf? Simply head over to adobe.com and click on our super shiny ninja star logo.

Maintaining your software library has never been easier... and it's 100% free.
